resources.string: West Grove area Tour guide
Dining
recreation
Shopping
parks
Asian food that you can get as mild or spicy as you want.
Country diner style food at a great price and very family friendly.
Pizza place with great service and very friendly owner.
Chinese food for delivery or carry out.
Standard american style diner.
Sandwich shop best know for it\'s super sized sandwiches.
American style food with a nice patio when the weather is nice.
Pretty standard italian restaurant with pretty good pizza that delivers.
Pretty standard bar with a limited menu but the food and staff good.
The only hibachi grill in the area, great for an entertaining dinner out.
Open park with swings, slides and a soccer field.
Open park with swing set and climbing structure. It also has a dog park and multiple trails.
Park with pavilions trails and playground equipment as well as baseball and soccer fields.
Nature preserve with lots of hiking trails and scenic views.
Park with pavilions playground sets and paths to walk or run on.
Shopping center with Wal-Mart, Starbucks, McDonalds and Snap Fitness.
Shopping center with TJ Maxx, Famous Footwear, Staples, Starbucks, Wendyâ€™s and, GNC.
Shopping center with Giant, Wells Fargo, Pat\'s Pizza, China One and, Wine and Spirits Shop.
Small shopping center with Six Paupers Restaurant and Pub, Wells Fargo, Long and Foster Realtors.
Larger shopping mall with a couple dozen man brand stores, mostly clothes and shoes, as well as a few electronics stores.
